snippet: The social news site BuzzFeed recently posted a hiring notice for a foreign editor, saying it wanted “to build a new kind of national security and world news coverage.”
abstract: Media Decoder blog; social news site BuzzFeed posts hiring notice for a foreign editor in effort described in listing as wanting 'to build a new kind of national security and world news coverage'.
lead_paragraph: The social news site BuzzFeed recently posted a hiring notice for a foreign editor, saying it wanted “to build a new kind of national security and world news coverage.”

headline.seo: BuzzFeed Takes Steps to Add Foreign News Coverage
headline.main: BuzzFeed Takes Steps to Expand Foreign News
headline.print_headline: BuzzFeed Takes Steps To Expand Foreign News
